name: Lazer_X version 4.0.0
description: Lazer_X is a new WhatsApp bot with amazing features. Make your WhatsApp more useful to you

SUDO.description: If you need to control your Lazer_X from another number paste it in the international form ex:- 947xxxxxxxx [94 is the Sri Lankan code] If you don't need this option, leave this.

BIO.description: Change the about of your Lazer_X.
BIO.value: Get your service from me. cause I'm the Lazer_X

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you like this option [AUTO_STICKER] you can write 'true'. If you don't want it, leave this.

FULL_LAZER.description: If you want to make your Lazer_X to a chat bot, type 'true'. Otherwise leave this.

LANGUAGE.description: Enter your language. If you use Sinhala type 'SI' | If you use English type 'EN'

AUTO_BIO.description: Setup your AUTO BIO feature. This is new clock for your WhatsApp about.

HANDLERS.description: Enter your bot prefix to use commands.

AI_BOT.description: Lazer_X is an ARTIFICIAL_INTELLIGENCE chat bot. To enable this feature type 'true'. To disable it type 'false'.

SEND_READ.description: This will show the users that the command seen after he send it. To enable 'true'. To disable 'false'.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Type the same app name you wrote at the first

CAPTIONS.description: Set the captions for under medias

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Type the message should be send to mute a group. If you don't want to change it leave it.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Type the numbers that you want to block the bot. ex:- (94xxxxxxxx)

ANTI_BAD.description: This will remove the participations that using bad words. If you want this option type 'true'. otherwise leave this.

WHATS_LINK_BLOCK.description: This will remove the participations that sharing links to the group. If you want this option type 'true'. otherwise leave this.

ALIVE_LOGO.description: To change the Alive message logo, Get a link for the photo you needed from this website: https://imgbb.com. Then paste it here.

WELCOME_LOGO.description: To change the Welcome message logo, Get a link for the photo you needed from this website: https://imgbb.com. Then paste it here.

BYE_LOGO.description: To change the Good bye message logo, Get a link for the photo you needed from this website: https://imgbb.com. Then paste it here.

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Type the message should be send to unmute a group. If you don't want to change it leave it.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Type the command that should be send to block a chat. If you don't want to change it, leave it.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Type the command that should be send to unblock a chat. If you don't want to change it, leave it.

WORK_TYPE.description: This change the bot's work type. If you change this to 'public' the bot will work for everyone. If you change this to 'private' bot will only work for you.

EMOJI_COMMAND.description: The Emoji in the command list, front of the word command

EMOJI_DESCRIPTION.description: The Emoji in the command list, front of the word description

EMOJI_WARNING.description: You can change command list emojis!

PANEL_COMMAND.description: The command to get the menu of Lazer_X. If you don't want to change this leave this option.

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Create an account and get your API key from this website: http://remove.bg. Then paste it.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: This can change the message you get when you send the command 'alive'. If you don't want to change this, leave this.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: The messge get when someone command as 'ban'. If you don't want to change it leave this!

BUG_COMMAND.description: Type the command for the bug virus.

TIME_ZONE.description: Type your time zone ex:- Sri Lankan's: Asia/Colombo [If you are a Sri Lankan, pass this]

INBOX_BLOCK.description: Type 'true' to activate the inbox block system. Otherwise leave this.

MENU_INFO.description: Write a MENU_HEADER for your bot
MENU_INFO.value: Hi everyone! This is ¬©Lazer_X‚òØÔ∏è command menu. This will help you lot when using ¬©Lazer_X‚òØÔ∏è This bot got 100 of features. So you can do many tasks with ¬©Lazer_X‚òØÔ∏è
